```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(MASS)
library(naniar)
```

```{r}
survey_data <- read_csv("survey_data.csv")
# View(survey_data)

survey_data <- survey_data %>%
  na.omit()
```
```{r}
head(survey_data)
```


```{r}
model_initial <- glm(vote_trump ~ vote_2016 + ideo5 + employment + foreign_born + gender + race_ethnicity + household_income + education + age, data = survey_data, binomial)
summary(model_initial)
```

```{r}
stepAIC(model_initial, direction = "both")
```

```{r}
model1 <- glm(vote_trump ~ vote_2016 + ideo5 + employment + gender + race_ethnicity + education, family = binomial, data = survey_data)
summary(model1)
```

```{r}
stepAIC(model1, direction = "both")
```
